titleInfo.title: Anti-Defamation League of B'nai B'rith Private Event

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Dr. Yoram Dinstein, Jan. 1968, Soviet Jewry.''

mods.abstract: Dr. Yoram Dinstein poses with three unidentified men and an unidentified woman at a private, confidential briefing session hosted by the Anti-Defamation League of B'nai B'rith and the Mid-East Public Information Committee. Dr. Dinstein, Consulate General of Israel in New York conducted the session titled ''The Jews and Russia.''

name.namePart: B'nai B'rith.--Anti-defamation League.--Mountain States Regional Office
